short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Disables the "Video Paused. Continue Watching?" popup on YouTube.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,te,t:
YouTube Auto Pause Blocker uses improved methods to prevent the "Video paused. Continue watching?" popup on YouTube. 

This extension ensures uninterrupted viewing by completely blocking the 'Video paused. Continue watching?' confirmation box from appearing, even if the tab is not focused/visible. 

Functions on regular YouTube and YouTube music.

Rest assured, this extension works flawlessly in any viewing mode, be it full-screen, miniplayer, or theater mode.

ADS
You may encounter ads for other extensions when using YouTube Auto Pause Blocker. These ads allow us to offer this extension for free.

DISCLAIMER
Please note that "YouTube Auto Pause Blocker" is not made by YouTube‚Ñ¢ or affiliated with YouTube‚Ñ¢. YouTube‚Ñ¢ is a trademark of Google LLC.
